thread.title: Great hotel -
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: fernandaluft
title: Great hotel -
text:
Great hotel in Chelsea, perfect location to walk around NYC, the staff is extremely friendly and polite. I arrived in the morning with my mom after a tiring flight from Las Vegas and we were allowed an early check-in, which was great! There's also a small area in the lobby with some options of snacks, including healthy ones. Also, check-in and checkout were very simple. The room was big and clean.
I would stay there again!
